title: Junior Software Engineer
description:
Company Description
 



 DomAIyn Labs is an ethical AI company dedicated to creating private, secure, and responsible intelligence systems. We are the developers of Bayora, a cutting\\-edge LLM Safety Engine that ensures AI models are stress\\-tested in a secure and private manner, without data leaving the clientâ€™s environment. Our mission is to establish safety, privacy, and ethical integrity in AI systems, addressing vulnerabilities and transforming AI from a black\\-box technology to reliable and accountable intelligence. Headquartered in the dynamic AI landscape of Dublin, we are committed to building trust in AI through innovative solutions.
 



  





 Role Description
 



 This is a full\\-time Junior Software Engineer role (Remotely). The Junior Software Engineer will contribute to the design, development, and maintenance of robust and secure software applications. Responsibilities include writing clean, efficient code, participating in back\\-end web development, implementing object\\-oriented programming principles, and collaborating with cross\\-functional teams to deliver high\\-quality software solutions. The role also involves identifying potential vulnerabilities in AI systems and contributing to the continuous improvement of our products.
 



  





 Qualifications
 


* Strong foundational knowledge of Computer Science concepts
* Proficiency in Programming and Object\\-Oriented Programming (OOP)
* Ability to collaborate effectively in a team environment and solve complex problems
* Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams (engineering, research, product) to deliver high\\-quality, secure, and ethically aligned AI solutions.
* Interest or experience in Artificial Intelligence / Machine Learning, especially Large Language Models (LLMs) (e.g., OpenAI, Anthropic, Hugging Face, or similar).
* Basic understanding of ML workflows (data preprocessing, model evaluation, metrics, experimentation) is a plus.
* An understanding of security principles and privacy standards (e.g., data protection, access control, secure coding) is highly desirable.
* Curiosity and willingness to learn about AI safety, robustness, and evaluation.



  





 Salary : Open to Negotiate.
 



 Location: Remote, India\\-based candidates only.

title: Full Stack Engineer
description:
**Are you a full\\-stack developer who thrives on turning ambitious ideas into reality?** 
 We're not just building an app; we're solving a massive problem, and we need someone with a fire in their belly to help us get there.
 



**Your Mission:** 




**Architect and build the web or mobile application that will change the game. This isn't a 9\\-to\\-5 gig; it's a chance to make a real impact alongside a team of passionate, driven developers who are obsessed with pushing boundaries.** 




**Your Superpowers:** 



* **Node.js Ninja \\& React.js Rockstar:** 
 You've got 2\\-6 years of experience building scalable backends with Node.js and crafting beautiful UIs with React.js, Astro, Next.js, or Qwik. You're not afraid to dive deep into code and emerge with elegant solutions.
* **Relentless Problem Solver:** 
 You're a go\\-getter who doesn't stop until the job is done right. You thrive on challenges and find creative ways to overcome obstacles.
* **Bias for Action:** 
 You're not one to wait around for instructions. You take initiative, anticipate needs, and proactively drive projects forward.
* **Open\\-Source Advocate:** 
 You believe in the power of community and are eager to contribute to open\\-source projects that benefit everyone.



**Bonus Powers:** 



* **GraphQL, AWS Appsync, Lambda, Dockers, ECS, Firebase, and offline storage** 
 knowledge will make you an even more formidable force.



**What's in it for You:** 



* **Make Your Mark:** 
 This isn't just another job; it's a chance to be part of something extraordinary. Your contributions will directly shape our success.
* **Thrive in a High\\-Energy Environment:** 
 Surround yourself with like\\-minded individuals who are passionate, driven, and always pushing the limits.
* **No Bureaucracy, Just Results:** 
 We value action over formalities. If you're someone who gets things done, you'll fit right in.



**Are you ready to ignite your passion and unleash your potential?** 




  





*Location: HSR Layout, Bangalore.* 




*Salary Range : 4\\-12LPA* 




***Immediate joiners are preferred.***




***Minimum 2 years of experience in building software products is required. Profile will be rejected automatically for \\<2 years of experience.***
